items.preText:
Reifer, from over the wicket.

Vinod Rajpal: "@KK....shorter thr format(T20) ; one-liner the comments , Longer the format(ODI)..comments are in paragragh ...Hope to see Full page comments in upcoming Ashes!!"
items.text: back of a length, a touch too straight, tucked off the legs to fine leg
back of a length on off stump, rides the bounce nicely and looks to guide it down to third man, but backward point moves quickly to his left and dives to stop it. Carter the fielder
items.shortText: Reifer to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on middle and leg, clipped to deep square leg
back of a length, fifth-stump line, gets back and across to defend to backward point
short outside off, chops down on top of the bounce to place it to the right of third man
slower bouncer over leg stump, adjudged wide after Mahmudullah lets it pass. Height the issue, I'm guessing
shortish outside off, chopped down to third man
short, wide, lots of bounce, and Mahmudullah can't really keep the cut down, but he places it well, a fair distance to the right of third man
short, angling into the body, gets up to about waist height. Swivels and pulls it round to fine leg
back of a length angling in towards off stump, clipped to midwicket
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: length ball angling into middle stump, clipped to deep square leg
back of a length, angling in towards top of off, defended into the covers

dropped. Length ball, fifth-stump line. Presses forward to defend and he plays with a slightly open face. Ends up edging it to the right of the keeper, and Hope throws himself across for the low chance, stretches out one glove, and can't hold on in the end

items.preText: With that, Holder's gone off the field for a bit. Bowling change on the field, Cottrell returns to the attack. Left-arm over.
items.text: back of a length, angling away from off stump, punched into the point region
in the blockhole on off and middle, jams his bat down in a hurry to keep it out
items.shortText: Cottrell to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: back of a length, leg-stumpish, tucked away to fine leg. Leg byes is the signal from the umpire, may have gone off just thigh pad
items.shortText: Cottrell to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 leg bye

items.text: in the blockhole once more, on middle stump, clipped back to the bowler. Seemed to swing back into the right-hander late
full on leg stump, clipped to deep square leg

items.preText: Holder's about to return to the field now.
items.text: full-toss on leg stump, just under waist high, played down to midwicket with the bottom hand off the handle
items.shortText: Cottrell to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.preText: Forty one to get now from the last ten. Five fielders can go out on the boundary. Holder continues.
items.text: stays back to a length ball on off stump, defends towards backward point
down the track, and Mahmudullah has hoisted that onto the rooftops. Swings freely through a big drive that ends up clearing the wide long-on boundary by a long, long way
back of a length on off stump, lets it come on and nudges it to the right of midwicket with soft hands

items.preText:
Don: "How many drop catches and missed run outs have the windies had today? Outplayed, but hasn't helped."

Chris: "The formats definitely differ but the talent and confidence doesn't! Many of Englands ODI team came from being aggressive t20 style players. Jofra Archer being the latest of them. Pollard would 100% be in my team."
items.text: in the blockhole on off stump, jabbed into the off side
items.shortText: Holder to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full on off stump, clipped neatly down to long-on
shortish on off stump, rides the bounce and bunts it down in front of midwicket
